title: Package "Basic-Plan "
subTitle: Free 30-minute trial
description: Short and sweet - book your free 30-minute trial and start speaking Tamil like the Native Tamil.congrats!

title: Package "Mid Range Plan"
subTitle: Pay as you go
description: Not sure how much time you can commit to learning Tamil? Often out of town? Choose the flexible 'ready to grab' opportunity option to book only the classes that fit your busy schedule and learn Tamil at your own pace.

title: Best Value
subTitle: Package "Value Added Pack"
description: Looking for regular weekly classes to learn Tamil quickly and confidently? Opt for the monthly subscription and book 8 hourly classes tailored to fit your schedule.
